languages.text: Узрев деяния маршала Антара, висирь Кибелла спросила карты о его судьбе. На следующий же день к нему был приставлен ткач с единственной целью — защищать Соломона от любых покушений. Таковые не заставили себя ждать, и клинок ткача обагрился кровью еретиков. Маршал же, по случайности узнав о существовании невидимого защитника, приказал схватить и казнить ткача за убийства.

After witnessing the deeds of Marshal Anthar, Vizsier Kibellah asked the cards about his fate. The very next day, a spinner was assigned to him, tasked solely with protecting Solomorne from any and all assassination attempts. These were not long in coming, and the spinner's blade soon tasted the blood of heretics. For his part, the Marshal, after accidentally discovering that he had an invisible protector, had the spinner arrested and executed for multiple counts of murder.
languages.original_text: Узрев деяния маршала Антара, висирь Кибелла спросила карты о его судьбе. На следующий же день к нему был приставлен ткач с единственной целью — защищать Соломона от любых покушений. Таковые не заставили себя ждать, и клинок ткача обагрился кровью еретиков. Маршал же, по случайности узнав о существовании невидимого защитника, приказал схватить и казнить ткача за убийства.

traits.locale_text: After witnessing the deeds of Marshal Anthar, Vizsier Kibellah asked the cards about his fate. The very next day, a Weaver was assigned to him, tasked solely with protecting Solomorne from any assassination attempts. Those materialised soon enough, and the Weaver's blade tasted the blood of heretics. For his part, the Marshal, after accidentally discovering that he had an invisible protector, had the Weaver arrested and executed for multiple murders.

languages.text: Nachdem Wesir Kibellah Zeugin der Taten von Marschall Anthar wurde, befragte sie die Karten über sein Schicksal. Am nächsten Tag wurde ihm ein Spinner zugeteilt, mit der einzigen Aufgabe, Solomorne vor allen Mordanschlägen zu schützen. Diese ließen nicht lange auf sich warten, und schon bald schmeckte die Klinge des Spinners das Blut von Ketzern. Nachdem der Marschall zufällig herausgefunden hatte, dass er einen unsichtbaren Beschützer hatte, ließ er den Spinner verhaften und wegen mehreren Morden hinrichten.
languages.original_text: After witnessing the deeds of Marshal Anthar, Vizsier Kibellah asked the cards about his fate. The very next day, a spinner was assigned to him, tasked solely with protecting Solomorne from any and all assassination attempts. These were not long in coming, and the spinner's blade soon tasted the blood of heretics. For his part, the Marshal, after accidentally discovering that he had an invisible protector, had the spinner arrested and executed for multiple counts of murder.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem Wesir Kibellah Zeugin der Taten von Marschall Anthar wurde, befragte sie die Karten über sein Schicksal. Am nächsten Tag wurde ihm ein Spinner zugeteilt, mit der einzigen Aufgabe, Solomorne vor allen Mordanschlägen zu schützen. Diese ließen nicht lange auf sich warten, und schon bald schmeckte die Klinge des Spinners das Blut von Ketzern. Nachdem der Marschall zufällig herausgefunden hatte, dass er einen unsichtbaren Beschützer hatte, ließ er den Spinner verhaften und wegen mehreren Morden hinrichten.

languages.text: Après avoir été témoin des actes du maréchal Anthar, la vizir Kibellah interrogea les cartes pour savoir ce que lui réservait son destin. Dès le lendemain, il se vit attribuer un tisseur, qui avait pour seule et unique mission de protéger Solomorne de toute tentative d'assassinat. Très vite, la lame du tisseur baigna dans le sang des hérétiques. Après avoir découvert par hasard l'existence de ce garde du corps invisible, le maréchal le fit arrêter et exécuter pour meurtre.
languages.original_text: After witnessing the deeds of Marshal Anthar, Vizsier Kibellah asked the cards about his fate. The very next day, a spinner was assigned to him, tasked solely with protecting Solomorne from any and all assassination attempts. These were not long in coming, and the spinner's blade soon tasted the blood of heretics. For his part, the Marshal, after accidentally discovering that he had an invisible protector, had the spinner arrested and executed for multiple counts of murder.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir été témoin des actes du maréchal Anthar, la vizir Kibellah interrogea les cartes pour savoir ce que lui réservait son destin. Dès le lendemain, il se vit attribuer un tisseur, qui avait pour seule et unique mission de protéger Solomorne de toute tentative d'assassinat. Très vite, la lame du tisseur baigna dans le sang des hérétiques. Après avoir découvert par hasard l'existence de ce garde du corps invisible, le maréchal le fit arrêter et exécuter pour meurtre.

languages.text: 宿老绮贝菈见证了安萨元帅的所作所为之后，通过帝皇塔罗牌占卜了他的命运。就在第二天，绮贝菈将一位织网者派遣到了索罗蒙身边，负责保护索罗蒙免受一切暗杀企图所害。没过多久，预言中的刺客就纷纷出现了，而织网者的利刃很快就尝到了那些异端分子的鲜血。但对索罗蒙而言，当他意外发现有一位隐秘的守护者在暗中保护他时，他立刻以多起谋杀罪名逮捕了那位织网者，将其处决。
languages.original_text: After witnessing the deeds of Marshal Anthar, Vizsier Kibellah asked the cards about his fate. The very next day, a spinner was assigned to him, tasked solely with protecting Solomorne from any and all assassination attempts. These were not long in coming, and the spinner's blade soon tasted the blood of heretics. For his part, the Marshal, after accidentally discovering that he had an invisible protector, had the spinner arrested and executed for multiple counts of murder.

traits.locale_text: 宿老绮贝菈见证了安萨元帅的所作所为之后，通过帝皇塔罗牌占卜了他的命运。就在第二天，绮贝菈将一位织网者派遣到了索罗蒙身边，负责保护索罗蒙免受一切暗杀企图所害。没过多久，预言中的刺客就纷纷出现了，而织网者的利刃很快就尝到了那些异端分子的鲜血。但对索罗蒙而言，当他意外发现有一位隐秘的守护者在暗中保护他时，他立刻以多起谋杀罪名逮捕了那位织网者，将其处决。
宿老绮贝菈见证了安萨元帅的所作所为之后，通过帝皇塔罗牌占卜了他的命运。就在第二天，绮贝菈将一位织网者派遣到了索罗蒙身边，负责保护索罗蒙免受一切暗杀企图所害。没过多久，预言中的刺客就纷纷出现了，而织网者的利刃很快就尝到了那些异端分子的鲜血。但对索罗蒙而言，当他意外发现有一位隐秘的守护者在暗中保护他时，他立刻以多起谋杀罪名逮捕了那位织网者，将其处决。

languages.text: Tras ser testigo de los logros del Mariscal Anthar, la Visir Kibellah preguntó a las cartas por su destino. Al día siguiente, se le asignó a un tejedor con la única misión de proteger a Solomorne de todo intento de asesinato. No tardaron en producirse, y la espada del tejedor se tiñó con la sangre de los herejes. Por su parte, el Mariscal, tras descubrir por accidente que tenía un protector invisible, ordenó arrestar y ejecutar al tejedor por repetidos casos de homicidio.
languages.original_text: After witnessing the deeds of Marshal Anthar, Vizsier Kibellah asked the cards about his fate. The very next day, a spinner was assigned to him, tasked solely with protecting Solomorne from any and all assassination attempts. These were not long in coming, and the spinner's blade soon tasted the blood of heretics. For his part, the Marshal, after accidentally discovering that he had an invisible protector, had the spinner arrested and executed for multiple counts of murder.

traits.locale_text: Tras ser testigo de los logros del Mariscal Anthar, la Visir Kibellah preguntó a las cartas por su destino. Al día siguiente, se le asignó a un tejedor con la única misión de proteger a Solomorne de todo intento de asesinato. No tardaron en producirse, y la espada del tejedor se tiñó con la sangre de los herejes. Por su parte, el Mariscal, tras descubrir por accidente que tenía un protector invisible, ordenó arrestar y ejecutar al tejedor por repetidos casos de homicidio.

languages.text: アンサール将帥の行動を目の当たりにしたヴィジール・キベラは、カードに彼の運命を尋ねた。翌日、ソロモーンをあらゆる暗殺未遂から守る任務だけを負ったスピナーが彼に割り当てられた。暗殺未遂はすぐに起こり、スピナーの刃はやがて異端者の血を味わうことになった。将帥自身は、自分に見えない護衛がいることを偶然知った後、そのスピナーを複数の殺人罪で逮捕し処刑した。
languages.original_text: After witnessing the deeds of Marshal Anthar, Vizsier Kibellah asked the cards about his fate. The very next day, a spinner was assigned to him, tasked solely with protecting Solomorne from any and all assassination attempts. These were not long in coming, and the spinner's blade soon tasted the blood of heretics. For his part, the Marshal, after accidentally discovering that he had an invisible protector, had the spinner arrested and executed for multiple counts of murder.

traits.locale_text: アンサール将帥の行動を目の当たりにしたヴィジール・キベラは、カードに彼の運命を尋ねた。翌日、ソロモーンをあらゆる暗殺未遂から守る任務だけを負ったスピナーが彼に割り当てられた。暗殺未遂はすぐに起こり、スピナーの刃はやがて異端者の血を味わうことになった。将帥自身は、自分に見えない護衛がいることを偶然知った後、そのスピナーを複数の殺人罪で逮捕し処刑した。

languages.text: Miralay Anthar'ın yaptıklarına tanık olan Vezir Kibellah, kartlara Üsteğmen'in kaderini sordu. Hemen ertesi gün, tek görevi her türlü suikast girişiminden Solomorne'u korumak olan bir dokur atandı. Suikast girişimleri gecikmedi ve dokurun kılıcı çok geçmeden kâfirlerin kanına bulandı. Miralay ise görünmez bir muhafız olduğunu kazara keşfettikten sonra dokuru defalarca işlediği cinayetlerden tutuklatıp idam ettirdi.
languages.original_text: After witnessing the deeds of Marshal Anthar, Vizsier Kibellah asked the cards about his fate. The very next day, a spinner was assigned to him, tasked solely with protecting Solomorne from any and all assassination attempts. These were not long in coming, and the spinner's blade soon tasted the blood of heretics. For his part, the Marshal, after accidentally discovering that he had an invisible protector, had the spinner arrested and executed for multiple counts of murder.

traits.locale_text: Miralay Anthar'ın yaptıklarına tanık olan Vezir Kibellah, kartlara Üsteğmen'in kaderini sordu. Hemen ertesi gün, tek görevi her türlü suikast girişiminden Solomorne'u korumak olan bir dokur atandı. Suikast girişimleri gecikmedi ve dokurun kılıcı çok geçmeden sapkınların kanına bulandı. Miralay ise görünmez bir muhafız olduğunu kazara keşfettikten sonra dokuru defalarca işlediği cinayetlerden tutuklatıp idam ettirdi.
